Package controller

Class CustomerRecordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CustomerRecordController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonUseHelperIfc, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomerRecordController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, CommonUseHelperIfc
    This class provides a data control flow between displaying customer record view and database tables
